item.description:
Journey Within and Out - A Yoga and Meditation Retreat for Women

OPEN your heart and OPEN your mind to a playful and reflective experience of Yoga, Dance, and Meditation. Join like minded women in this one day retreat at The Larches Inn. In this magical setting, on Sampson's Pond, we will meditate in the garden, journal and reflect at the pond, and during the fire ceremony release blocks to create space for unlimited possibility.

About our facilitators: Lisa Kim and Vitoria Haffer hold Yoga teacher certifications from Kripalu Center in Stockbridge MA.

Together they have over 30 years of combined experience in the wellness industry. What is consistent in all of their teachings is deep compassion, connection with the breath, cultivation of body, awareness and acceptance, and the invitation to be more conscious of your inner wisdom through self inquire and exploration of your edge.

For more information please go to -

http://www.thelarches...
item.name: Journey Within and Out - A Yoga and Meditation Retreat for Women
